back_text: [skull]: Reveal another token. If you fail, randomly choose an enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it. (Limit once per test.) [cultist]: -X. X is the amount of horror on you. If you fail, take 1 horror. [tablet]: -X. X is the base shroud value of your location. If you fail, take 1 horror. [elder_thing]: 0. Either randomly choose an enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it, or this test automatically fails instead.
name: The Unspeakable Oath
text: [skull]: -1. If you fail, randomly choose an enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it. [cultist]: -X. X is the amount of horror on you. [tablet]: -X. X is the base shroud value of your location. [elder_thing]: 0. Either randomly choose an enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it, or this test automatically fails instead.

back_text: Shuffle the encounter discard pile and each of the set-aside Lunatic enemies into the encounter deck. The lead investigator must randomly choose an enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it.
flavor: The patient wing of the asylum is far quieter and lonelier than you had expected. The hall reeks of chemicals and body odor. As soon as you are escorted inside, the doors behind you are closed and locked tight.
name: Locked Inside

back_text: The lead investigator must randomly choose an enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and shuffle it into the encounter deck without looking at it. Check Campaign Log. If Constance Dumaine is not listed under "VIPs Slain," search the collection for Constance Dumaine (A Litte Too Sociable) and spawn her in the Garden.
flavor: The longer you spend in this hellish place, the more you want to leave. Already it has felt like days. You fear that if you are stuck here much longer, you will become like the patients: a husk of your former self, unruly, and dangerous.
name: Torturous Descent

back_text: Each investigator who has not resigned is defeated.
flavor: Flee.Flee while you still can.
name: His Domain
text: Forced - When you would place an enemy beneath the act deck: Shuffle that enemy into the encounter deck, instead.

back_text:
The investigators must decide (choose one):
- Any investigator tests [combat] (4) to intimidate her into giving you the asylum keys. If successful, advance to act 2a. If failed, you must choose an option you have yet to choose.
- Any investigator tests [agility] (4) to steal the asylum keys from her. If successful, advance to act 2a. If failed, you must choose an option you have yet to choose.
- Any investigator tests [intellect] (4) to persuade her to give you the asylum keys. If successful, advance to act 2a. If failed, you must choose an option you have yet to choose.
- You knock her over and wrestle the asylum keys away from her. Remember that "you took the keys by force." Advance to act 2a.
flavor: Aside from the few patients giving you a wide berth, there aren’t any orderlies or doctors around to speak with. Looks like you’ll have to find Mr. Chesterfield on your own.
name: Arkham Asylum

back_text:
Choose an investigator at Patient Confinement . Put the set-aside Daniel Chesterfield card (asset side faceup) into play under that investigator's control.
Shuffle the encounter discard pile and each enemy beneath the act deck into the encounter deck.
flavor: Daniel is somewhere in the secured basement where the most dangerous patients are kept. Now that you have the key, you can explore this area of the asylum.
name: "The Really Bad Ones" (v. I)
text: Ignore the text on the unrevealed side of Arkham Asylum locations. Objective - Find the Patient Confinement location with Daniel Chesterfield.

back_text: Spawn the set-aside Daniel Chesterfield (enemy side faceup) at Patient Confinement .
flavor: Daniel is somewhere in the secured basement where the most dangerous patients are kept. Now that you have the key, you can explore this area of the asylum.
name: "The Really Bad Ones" (v. II)
text: Ignore the text on the unrevealed side of Arkham Asylum locations. Objective - Find the Patient Confinement location with Daniel Chesterfield.

back_text: Shuffle the encounter discard pile and each enemy beneath the act deck into the encounter deck. If at least 3 Monster enemies were shuffled into the encounter deck by this effect, the investigator with the lowest [willpower] discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Monster enemy is discarded, and draws that enemy.
flavor: With or without Daniel, you have to get out of this place as soon as you can.
name: Planning the Escape
text: Ignore the text on the unrevealed side of Arkham Asylum locations. Objective - If investigators have performed 4 of the following, you must advance. —"Know the guards' patrols." —"Set a fire in the kitchen." —"Incited a fight amongst the patients." —"Released a dangerous patient." —"Recalled the way out." —"Distracted the guards."

back_text: If "you took the keys by force," read the following: (→R2) ———————————————————————————— Otherwise, read the following: (→R3)
flavor: All hell has broken loose.
name: No Asylum
text: Ignore the text on the unrevealed side of Arkham Asylum locations. Garden gains: "[action] If there is no ready enemy in the Garden: Resign. Finally, a way out!" Objective - If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

flavor: The pleasant atmosphere of the reception area disappeared as soon as Dr. Mintz shut the thick iron door behind them. The temperature dropped to a clammy chill, and a foul, sharp stench hung in the air.– Mallory O’Meara, The Investigators of Arkham Horror
name: Asylum Halls
text: [reaction] After you defeat a Lunatic enemy at this location: Draw 1 card.

flavor: The pleasant atmosphere of the reception area disappeared as soon as Dr. Mintz shut the thick iron door behind them. The temperature dropped to a clammy chill, and a foul, sharp stench hung in the air.– Mallory O’Meara, The Investigators of Arkham Horror
name: Asylum Halls
text: Each Lunatic enemy at this location gets +1 horror value.

flavor: The pleasant atmosphere of the reception area disappeared as soon as Dr. Mintz shut the thick iron door behind them. The temperature dropped to a clammy chill, and a foul, sharp stench hung in the air.– Mallory O’Meara, The Investigators of Arkham Horror
name: Asylum Halls
text: [action] Take 1 horror: Evade. Automatically evade a Lunatic enemy at this location.

flavor: The pleasant atmosphere of the reception area disappeared as soon as Dr. Mintz shut the thick iron door behind them. The temperature dropped to a clammy chill, and a foul, sharp stench hung in the air.– Mallory O’Meara, The Investigators of Arkham Horror
name: Asylum Halls
text: Forced - After you end your turn at this location: Take 1 horror and gain 2 resources.

back_text: The door leading into the Kitchen is locked. You cannot enter the Kitchen.
flavor: The narrow door in the back of the mess hall is locked. The scent that strikes you from behind the door is foul and repugnant.
name: Kitchen
text: [action] If there are no clues on the Kitchen: Test [willpower] (2). If you succeed, remember that you "set a fire in the kitchen."

flavor: A wide, open doorway leads into the asylum’s mess hall, where patients would have their meals. It’s quieter than you expected—there are no chairs scuffling, dishes clanking, or patients speaking with one another.
name: Mess Hall
text: Forced - After you successfully investigate the Mess Hall: Choose and discard 1 card from your hand.

flavor: The scratched plaque on this wooden door reads: “Infirmary.” This must be where the doctors treat their patients.
name: Infirmary
text: [action]: Heal 1 damage and take 1 direct horror, or heal 1 horror and take 1 direct damage. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: The fresh air and the illusion of freedom makes the asylum’s courtyard a common gathering place for patients. Through the barred windows, dead tree branches sway in the wind. Gray, overcast skies trap the asylum in a dull limbo.
name: Yard
text:
While you are investigating the Yard, it gets +1 shroud for each horror on you.
[action] If there are no clues on Yard, take 1 damage: Remember that you "incited a fight amongst the patients."

back_text: The gate leading into the Garden is locked. You cannot enter the Garden.
flavor: A lone statue stands sentinel over the garden. Cold wind causes dead leaves to roll gently across the garden path.
name: Garden
text: [action] If there are no clues on Garden: Test [agility] (2). If you succeed, remember that you "distracted the guards."

back_text: The door leading into the Basement Hall is locked. You cannot enter the Basement Hall.
flavor: Dank air drifted out of some of the darker hallways. Carolyn asked, “Do some of these passageways lead underground?”Nurse Heather nodded. “It’s a very old building, Doctor.”– Mallory O’Meara, The Investigators of Arkham Horror
name: Basement Hall
text: Forced - After the Basement Hall is revealed: Put the 4 set-aside Patient Confinement locations into play.

back_text: As an additional cost to enter Patient Confinement, you must spend 1 clue.
flavor: The heavy metal door is firmly shut and locked from the outside. The thin slit that would allow you to peer inside the cell is stuck.
name: Patient Confinement
text: Forced - After Patient Confinement is revealed: Advance to act 2b.

back_text: As an additional cost to enter Patient Confinement, you must spend 1 clue.
flavor: The heavy metal door is firmly shut and locked from the outside. The thin slit that would allow you to peer inside the cell is stuck.
name: Patient Confinement
text: [action]: Test [combat] (2) to release the patient here from his bonds. If you succeed, he howls like a wolf and tears off through the basement; remember that you "released a dangerous patient."

back_text: As an additional cost to enter Patient Confinement, you must spend 1 clue.
flavor: The heavy metal door is firmly shut and locked from the outside. The thin slit that would allow you to peer inside the cell is stuck.
name: Patient Confinement
text: [action]: Test [intellect] (2) to speak to the patient here. If you succeed, you are able to interpret her ravings; remember that you "know the guards' patrols."

back_text: As an additional cost to enter Patient Confinement, you must spend 1 clue.
flavor: The heavy metal door is firmly shut and locked from the outside. The thin slit that would allow you to peer inside the cell is stuck.
name: Patient Confinement
text: [action]: Test [willpower] (X), where X is the amount of horror on you. If you succeed, you recognize the room; remember that you "recalled the way out."

back_text: Prey - Highest [combat]. [action] If you control Clasp of Black Onyx: Parley. You show Daniel the clasp, and he staggers backward, collapsing into a motionless husk. Add him to the victory display.
name: Daniel Chesterfield
subname: He’s Not Doing All Too Well
text: [free] Exhaust Daniel Chesterfield: Give control of him to another investigator at your location. Forced - When you take horror, if at least 1 of that horror is not assigned to Daniel Chesterfield: Take 1 damage. Forced - If Daniel Chesterfield leaves play: Remove him from the game.

name: Asylum Gorger
text: Spawn - Basement Halls. Hunter. Asylum Gorger cannot make attacks of opportunity, and cannot attack during the same phase it moved from its hunter keyword.

flavor: Sometimes the most terrifying of foes is one’s own mind.
name: Mad Patient
text: Spawn - Nearest Asylum Halls. Prey - Most remaining sanity. Forced - When you attack Mad Patient: Take 1 horror.

flavor: “What are you doing? I’m not crazy!”
name: Straitjacket
text: Revelation - If there is no copy of Straitjacket in your threat area, put Straitjacket into play in your threat area as an asset that takes up a body slot and 2 hand slots. Return all assets you control in those slots to your hand. Straitjacket cannot leave play except by the ability below. [action] [action]: Discard Straitjacket.

name: Gift of Madness (Pity)
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Gift of Madness (Pity) to your hand. You cannot attack Lunatic enemies. [action]: Randomly choose 1 enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it. Discard Gift of Madness (Pity) from your hand.

name: Gift of Madness (Misery)
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Gift of Madness (Misery) to your hand. You cannot trigger [action] abilities on locations. [action]: Randomly choose 1 enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it. Discard Gift of Madness (Misery) from your hand.

name: Walls Closing In
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (X), where X is the shroud value of your location. If you fail, you must either take 1 horror for each point you failed by, or randomly choose 1 enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it.
